revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Embest Technology |model=SBC-EC9100 |revision=(REV 02) |asin=B0BHQMZGS2 |is_manuf=No |price=30 |est_release_date=06/2016 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Freescale (NXP) |cpu1_model=i.MX6ULL;MCIMX6G3DVM05AA; |cpu1_cspeed=528 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MTFC4GLDEA-0M WT |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MTFC4GLDEA-0M WT |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, via GPIO header,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Microchip |eth_chip2_model=KSZ8081 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=PMIC for i.MX6UL;NXP;MC34PF3001A7EP;;1;,,, High-Speed CAN Transceiver;NXP;MC33901;;2;,,, 256Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;ON Semi;CAT24C256;;1;,,, Dual USB High-Side Power Switch;Sipex;SP2526A;;1;,,, Programmable-Delay Supervisory Circuit;TI;TPS3808;;1;,,, Full-Duplex RS485/RS-422 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM3485;;1;,,, Low-Voltage I/O Touch Screen Controller;Burr-Brown;TSC2046;;1;,,, Very Low Capacitance ESD Protection;STMicro;USBLC6-2;;2;,,, Low Capacitance TVS Diode Array;Semtech;SRV05-4;;2;,,, 4-bit Low-Voltage FET Bus Switch;TI;SN74CB3Q3257;;1;,,, 12V, 12A Single P-Channel PowerTrench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMA908PZ;;2; |flags=MicroSD Card slot, MIPI CSI, CAN Bus, RS485, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO |stock_boot=U-Boot;2015.04; |stock_os=Linux;3.14.52;Debian 8.4; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=debian |default_pass=debian }} {{TagLine|SBC-EC9100}} :[https://www.emtop-tech.com/product/sbc-ec9100/ Product page]
"SBC-EC9100 REV02" and "2016-6-2" is on top of board.
===Links=== *[https://github.com/EMTOP-TECH/SBC-EC9100/tree/main ''SBC-EC9100'' on '''GitHub''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' i.MX6ULL @528MHz :MCIMX6G3DVM05AA â€¢ ARM (Cortex-A7) *Memory: 512MB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Storage: 4GB (eMMC) Flash *Network: 1x FE port *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG) ports *GPIO: 2x 40-pin headers *Power Source: 5V/2A via barrel
__NOTOC__
